text: Talut, seneyondige horataga helidaru; ‘‘allahanu ondu nadiya mulaka nim'mannu pariksisuvanu. Adara niru kudiyuvavanu nannavanalla. Adara ruciyanne nodadavanu matra khandita nannavanu – yaradaru tanna kaiyinda, ondu bogaseyastu matra kudidare tappalla’. Adare avarallina kevala kelavara horatu itarellaru a holeya nirannu kudidaru. Konege, ata (talut) mattu atana jotegidda visvasigalu nadiyannu datidaga, a mandi, ‘‘indu nam'ma bali, jalut mattavana padegalannu edurisuva sakti ulidilla’’ endu bittaru. Adare tavu allahanannu bhetiyagalikkide emba nirikse ittukondiddavaru ‘‘adesto bari, sanna padegalu allahana anugrahadinda dodda padegalannu solisidduntu. Allahanantu sahanasilara jotegiddane’’ endaru
